Posts.Content: Jul 2, 2008 07:10AM chickenchaps wrote: Thanks folks!  I am anxious to see the path report, but cant do nothing but wait... Hiccups went away.  I had water in the bedroom but that wasnt getting rid of them, so I went to the kitchen and drank some grape juice and that got rid of them, for a short time, came back, more grape juice.  :)  I have tried the sugar before, that has worked in the past as well.  Or drinking water upside down sometimes works.  Wonder if its a low sugar in my body causes them?  So far, havent had them again today.  I came to work today because I felt fine.  I figured if I stayed home I may be tempted to do some chores I shouldnt do, so best to sit at my desk at work.  :)  Other than feeling a little bit dizzy once in a while I feel fine.
Posts.Title: excisional biopsy done, now waiting chickenchaps chickenchaps

Posts.Content: Jul 2, 2008 07:31AM chickenchaps wrote: Thank you!  Trying very hard to be kind to me.  :)  Very tough though!  I didnt milk my goats yesterday, or let my chickens out.  I feel like such a mean mommy...  lol
Posts.Title: excisional biopsy done, now waiting chickenchaps chickenchaps

Posts.Content: Jul 2, 2008 12:11PM chickenchaps wrote: I am going to have to break down and ask him to help me tonight.  Chickeys will need fed and that will be too heavy for me to carry to the coop.  :(  I think I can milk the goats myself.  He wont do that.  lol  I feel dizzy when standing, smoking.  I know I know, I shouldnt smoke.  But at this point in my life I wouldnt be successful at quitting anyway.  These lump issues is only one of my stressors right now unfortunately.  I will keep drinking lots of water, thanks for the tip. I appreciate everybody's support, you folks are amazing!  Thank you.
Posts.Title: excisional biopsy done, now waiting chickenchaps chickenchaps

Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2008 06:22AM chickenchaps wrote: I just had excisional biopsy July 1.  2 cuts almost an inch each.  They put me out.  Used steri strips.  I dont know if the doc gave me a nerve block or what, (he didnt say he did), but I had zero pain!  Amazing.  I never took one pill.  Went to work the next day and even milked my goats.  I tried very hard not to lift anything heavy for a few days even though it didnt hurt.  I did crack my bull whip July 4th though.  lol  And less than a week after I was lifting bales of hay in and out of my truck.  Ok, so I shouldnt have been doing all that, but it didnt hurt at all!  I hope you have NO pain as well!  Good luck!
Posts.Title: Have you had an excisional biopsy? What can i expect? erin1 leaf
